ca.concordia.app.service

Class GamePlayService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.app.service.GamePlayService

  • public class GamePlayService
extends java.lang.Object
    This is GamePlayService class through which game is going to play. It also contains startup, reinforcement and fortification phases.
    Author:
    Parth Nayak

      • doStartupPhase

        public void doStartupPhase(int numberOfPlayers,
                           java.util.List<? extends PlayerStrategy> strategies)
        This is startup phase. As per the number of players it will generate the data, initializing players data, allocating countries to players and it will add armies using round-robin fashion.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - the number of players
        strategies - strategies of game
